Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,72 @@
+IDE: V.S
+
+create JS project
+project terminal  :
+npm init
+npm i puppeteer --save
+npm i mocha --save
+npm i chai --save
+npm i jest --save
+npm i jest-image-snapshot --save
+npm i prettier --save
+npm i @supercharge/strings  // generate string
+"scripts": {
+    "test": "node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --timeout=30000 ./tests/**.js" },
+  
+  npm run test
+
+npm install --save-dev --save-exact prettier
+
+
+
+puppeteer.....................
+const puppeteer = require('puppeteer');
+
+describe('Registraion Scenario ', () => {
+
+    it('Launch Browser', async function() {
+
+    })
+
+})
+        const browser = await puppeteer.launch({headless:false, args: ['--start-maximized'] }) // open browser in maxmize window
+        const page = await browser.newPage(); // open new tab
+        await page.setViewport({ width: 1266, height: 768}); // set screen size
+        await page.goto('https://www.moebel-kraft.de/'); // navigate to url 
+        const title = await page.title() // get title
+	
+	await page.waitForTimeout(1000)
+	await page.goForward()
+    await page.goBack()
+	await page.reload()
+	await page.type('','')
+    await page.click("css") ;
+    await page.setDefaultNavigationTimeout(10000)
+    await page.setDefaultTimeout(10000)
+
+wait for element display ................
+await page.waitForXPath(//xpath)
+or
+await page.waitForSelector(css)
+
+wait for element disappear ................
+await page.waitFor(()=>!document.querySelector(CSS))
+or 
+await page.waitForSelector('CSS',{hidden:true,timeout:3000})
+
+Hooks...........................
+    before(async function() {
+    })
+    after(async function() {
+    })
+    beforeEach(async function() {
+    })
+    afterEach(async function() {
+    })
+
+
+chai..........................
+const expect = require('chai').expect
+expect(title).to.be.a('Möbelhaus Kraft - Möbel und Dekorationen für ein schöneres Zuhause')
+expect(emailOptOutConfirmedValue).to.include('yes')
+expect(number)..to.equal(int)
\ No newline at end of file

commits.content:
IDE: V.S

create JS project
project terminal  :
npm init
npm i puppeteer --save
npm i mocha --save-dev 
npm i chai --save-dev 

"scripts": {
    "test": "node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --timeout=30000 ./tests/**.js"
  },
  
  npm run test



npm install --save-dev --save-exact prettier





    const Browser = await puppeteer.launch ({headless:false,slowMo:500 ,devtools:true})}) // slowMo ->slowdown execution
	
	await page.waitForTimeout(1000)
	await page.goForward()
    await page.goBack()
	await page.reload()
	
    await page.type('','')
